item.title: AZ-104 — Introduction and Manage Azure Identities & Governance
item.description: Begin your AZ-104 journey. Learn the exam structure, skills measured, and dive into Azure Active Directory, RBAC, and governance fundamentals.

item.title: AZ-104 — Manage Azure Storage and Compute Resources
item.description: Learn how to manage Azure Storage Accounts, Virtual Machines, and related compute resources in the AZ-104 Administrator certification path.

item.title: AZ-104 Exam Guide — Introduction to Microsoft Azure Administrator
item.description: Get started with the AZ-104 certification journey. Learn what the exam covers, who should take it, study strategies, and tools required to pass confidently.
